name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Odoruppe' with IRyS and Ina.
IRyS MC segment, welcoming viewers and talking about her birthday live.
IRyS reveals her 6th Fes Colorize outfit and talks about the live concept.

subtitles.original: ほら 踊ってる
subtitles.english: See, I'm dancing

subtitles.original: ダンスホールの未来に
subtitles.english: In the dance hall's future

subtitles.original: 色を塗っていくのは あなた あなた
subtitles.english: The one painting the colors is you, you

subtitles.original: ダンスは笑顔で待ってる
subtitles.english: The dance is waiting with a smile

subtitles.english: I don't know a night without dancing

subtitles.english: I don't like a night without dancing

subtitles.english: A night without a night without dancing

subtitles.english: I want to know a night where I want to dance

subtitles.english: I want to like a night where I want to dance

subtitles.english: I don't know any more nights I don't like

subtitles.english: A night without a night without dancing

subtitles.original: とってもとってもとっても大切なんです
subtitles.english: It's very, very, very important

subtitles.original: とってもとってもとっても大切です
subtitles.english: It's very, very, very important

subtitles.original: HiRyS, it's IRyS from hololive English -Promise-
subtitles.english: HiRyS, it's IRyS from hololive English -Promise-

subtitles.original: hololive EnglishのIRySです！
subtitles.english: I'm IRyS from hololive English!

subtitles.original: Welcome to my birthday live, Hope Upon a Star!
subtitles.english: Welcome to my birthday live, Hope Upon a Star!

subtitles.original: Thank you so, so much for coming!
subtitles.english: Thank you so, so much for coming!

subtitles.original: 今年の誕生日ライブ見に来てくれて、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming to see this year's birthday live!

subtitles.original: Hope Upon a Star、今年はちょっと誕生日よりちょっとだけ遅いんですけど、誕生日ライブです！
subtitles.english: Hope Upon a Star, it's a bit later than my birthday this year, but it's my birthday live!

subtitles.original: Yes, it's a little bit later than my actual birthday, but, you know, it's no problem.
subtitles.english: Yes, it's a little bit later than my actual birthday, but, you know, it's no problem.

subtitles.original: Please do post your comments and screenshots using the hashtag...
subtitles.english: Please do post your comments and screenshots using the hashtag...

subtitles.original: ...#IRySBDay2025 written over here!
subtitles.english: ...#IRySBDay2025 written over here!

subtitles.original: I'd be really happy if you took a lot of screenshots, 'cause there's gonna be a lot of cool moments. Yay!
subtitles.english: I'd be really happy if you took a lot of screenshots, 'cause there's gonna be a lot of cool moments. Yay!

subtitles.original: 今回のライブのハッシュタグは #IRySBDay2025 です！
subtitles.english: The hashtag for this live is #IRySBDay2025!

subtitles.original: ぜひ感想とかスクショもたくさん撮ってポストしてくれたら嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if you take lots of screenshots and post your thoughts!

subtitles.original: じゃあね、ちょっとみんなに見せたいものがあるんだ！
subtitles.english: Now then, I have something I want to show everyone!

subtitles.original: I have something I really want to show you guys.
subtitles.english: I have something I really want to show you guys.

subtitles.original: So let me go prepare real quick!
subtitles.english: So let me go prepare real quick!

subtitles.original: ジャン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: It's the 6th Fes outfit! It's the Bright...
subtitles.english: It's the 6th Fes outfit! It's the Bright...

subtitles.original: Was that the title? The... the...
subtitles.english: Was that the title? The... the...

subtitles.original: ...the Colorize outfit!
subtitles.english: ...the Colorize outfit!

subtitles.original: It's so cute, right? I love this outfit so much.
subtitles.english: It's so cute, right? I love this outfit so much.

subtitles.original: 今年の6th Fes衣装、早速着てみました！
subtitles.english: I tried on this year's 6th Fes outfit right away!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ可愛いでしょ？ もう最高、最高！
subtitles.english: Isn't it super cute? It's just the best!

subtitles.original: I love this outfit so much, it's just so pretty, it's elegant, it's so pretty and it looks so... yeah!
subtitles.english: I love this outfit so much, it's just so pretty, it's elegant, it's so pretty and it looks so... yeah!

subtitles.original: What do you guys think? Do you guys think it's cute? Yeah, very cute.
subtitles.english: What do you guys think? Do you guys think it's cute? Yeah, very cute.

subtitles.original: Anyways, the concept of this live concert is to sing my favorite songs from different eras of music...
subtitles.english: Anyways, the concept of this live concert is to sing my favorite songs from different eras of music...

subtitles.original: ...focusing on dance and some Euro, 'cause I know you guys love Euro as much as I do, right? Yeah!
subtitles.english: ...focusing on dance and some Euro, 'cause I know you guys love Euro as much as I do, right? Yeah!

subtitles.original: There are also different kinds of music players for each song all over this stage. Can you spot them all?
subtitles.english: There are also different kinds of music players for each song all over this stage. Can you spot them all?

subtitles.original: 今回のライブは、アイリスの好きなダンス曲やユーロビートの曲を懐かしい曲から新しい曲まで...
subtitles.english: This live features IRyS's favorite dance and Eurobeat tracks, from classics to new hits...

subtitles.original: ...いろんな楽曲デバイスと一緒に歌いまくります！ みんな楽しんでってね！
subtitles.english: ...singing along with various music devices! Hope you all enjoy!

subtitles.original: Speaking of which, talking about music devices, what do you guys think of my jukebox?
subtitles.english: Speaking of which, talking about music devices, what do you guys think of my jukebox?

subtitles.original: Isn't it big and cool? Yeah!
subtitles.english: Isn't it big and cool? Yeah!

subtitles.original: I put a lot of songs in here, so how about we start the next song? Yeah!
subtitles.english: I put a lot of songs in here, so how about we start the next song? Yeah!

subtitles.original: このジュークボックスかっこよくない？ たくさんの曲が入ってるんだ。
subtitles.english: Isn't this jukebox cool? It has lots of songs in it.

subtitles.original: じゃあ早速、次の曲いってみようかな？
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we head into the next song?
